title: Antarctica's Frozen Chosen
description: Antarctica changes people. Kyle and his girlfriend Jade get eco-involved when 21 year old Kyle gets a last-minute job for the Antarctic summer as a marine biologist. Kyle has to face questions of mateship and how far you will go to protect a friend. The 'frozen chosen' are those chosen to work in Antarctica.Author did go on an Australian Antarctic Division expedition in 2001.http://www.hazeledwards.com/page/anta... has links to more books about Antarctica
author: Hazel Edwards
